hero.title: Personal Data Protection Policy
hero.subtitle: PDPA
hero.description: We are committed to protecting your rights under the Personal Data Protection Act B.E. 2562 (2019). You have the right to control your personal data.

rights.title: Your Rights Under PDPA
rights.subtitle: You have 8 fundamental rights to control your personal data

access.title: Right to Access
access.desc: You have the right to access your personal data that we collect and use.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.desc: You can request correction of inaccurate, incomplete, or misleading data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.desc: You can request deletion or destruction of your personal data, or anonymization.

restriction.title: Right to Restriction
restriction.desc: You can request temporary suspension of personal data use.

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.desc: You can request your data in a commonly used format and transfer it to another controller.

object.title: Right to Object
object.desc: You can object to the collection, use, or disclosure of your personal data.

withdraw.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
withdraw.desc: You can withdraw consent for data collection, use, or disclosure at any time.

complaint.title: Right to Complaint
complaint.desc: You can file a complaint with the Personal Data Protection Committee if you believe data handling is unlawful.

exercise.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
exercise.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to exercise your rights

step1.title: Contact Us
step1.desc: Send request via email, phone, or online form

dpo.title: Data Protection Officer
dpo.description: If you have questions or need assistance regarding personal data protection, please contact our Data Protection Officer.
dpo.name: Name:
